sentences.en: Be sober - minded. Don't lose your head.
sentences.cn: 清醒一点;不要头脑发昏.

sentences.en: He dresses in sober grey suits.
sentences.cn: 他总是穿素净的灰西服。

sentences.en: He is honest, sober and hard-working.
He talked to us in a sober friendly fashion.
sentences.cn: 他以冷静而又友好的方式同我们交谈.

sentences.en: He was left to sober up in a police cell.
sentences.cn: 他被留在一间拘留室里醒酒。

sentences.en: He’s a nice guy when he’s sober.
sentences.cn: 他没喝醉时是个不错的家伙。

sentences.en: I need you sane and sober.
I promised him that I'd stay sober tonight.
sentences.cn: 我答应过他，今晚我不会喝醉。

sentences.en: It was a room filled with sad, sober faces.
sentences.cn: 房间里坐满了人，大家都一脸的忧伤和严肃。

sentences.en: Stay there with us until you've sobered up.
sentences.cn: 你就待在我们这儿，等酒醒了再走。

sentences.en: The binding is sober and solid.
The euphoria is giving way to a more sober assessment of the situation.
sentences.cn: 兴高采烈的情绪不见了，取而代之的是对局面更为清醒的认识。

sentences.en: The lessons learned at the cost of blood helped to sober us.
sentences.cn: 血的教训使我们的头脑清醒了.

sentences.en: The man was still sober when he went home.
sentences.cn: 那人回到家时头脑依然清醒.

sentences.en: We are now far more sober and realistic.
sentences.cn: 我们现在清醒、现实多了。

sentences.en: When sober he can come across as an extremely pleasant and charming young man.
sentences.cn: 没喝醉的时候，他看上去似乎是个极为彬彬有礼、讨人喜欢的小伙子。

words.tran_cn: 使清醒的；使冷静的；严重的

phrases.tran_cn: 清醒起来；使…清醒；使严肃起来

trans.tran_cn: 头脑清醒的，冷静的，未醉的，没喝醉的，有节制的，朴素的，素净的

trans.tran_en: to become more serious in behaviour or attitude, or to make someone become more serious
